description: The columbine (Aquilegia canadensis 'Corbett') is an amazing plant species, offering up a brilliant display of classic beauty among the wildflowers. The elegant red and yellow flowers emerge in spring and last into summer, set against a backdrop of vibrant green foliage. This perennial instantly enhances any landscape design and makes a delightful cut flower for summer bouquets. When placed in a rich, loamy soil with full to partial sunlight, it will attract beneficial pollinators and brighten any corner of the garden. This species of columbine will surely add the perfect splash of color to any garden.
